$diagnostic_list$`Shock: inflation`
$diagnostic_list$`Shock: inflation`[[1]]
                               R-sqrd. Adj. R-sqrd.    F-stat     p-value
h1:debt                      0.2446769  -0.04306518 0.8503341 0.625253027
h1:inflation_expectations_1y 0.3832254   0.14826369 1.6310121 0.102485451
